seo.title: Ferragosto w Positano (Wniebowzięcie)
seo.description: Jak wygląda Ferragosto: procesje, fajerwerki, wskazówki dotyczące tłumów i rezerwacji.

sections.title: Beach and swimming tips
body: Swim early or at sunset when lifeguards have clearer sightlines; midday crowds make currents harder to judge.

sections.title: Transport backups
body: Ferries can sell out; secure round-trip tickets the day before and have a bus plan if seas turn rough.

tips: Pack earplugs if your room faces the beach—the fireworks finale and post-show music can run past 01:00.

faqs.q: Can I watch the fireworks from the hostel terrace?
